it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager

Class PathManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.UserManager
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.PathManager

  • public class PathManager
extends UserManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle the path computation

      • postConstruct

        @PostConstruct
public void postConstruct()

      • calculatePath

        public PathCombination calculatePath(Event event,
                                     java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                     java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans)
                              throws GMapsGeneralException
        Compute the best path relative to a given event calculating the schedule.
        Parameters:
        event - event that need a feasible path.
        privateMeans - allowed private travel means according to event preferences.
        publicMeans - allowed public travel means according to event preferences.
        Returns:
        the requested path if available by means of calcPathNoSetSchedule, null if it doesn't exists.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • calcPathNoSetSchedule

        private PathCombination calcPathNoSetSchedule(Event event,
                                              java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                              java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans)
                                       throws GMapsGeneralException
        Compute the best path relative to a given event without calculate the schedule. It is used in swap function and it is called in all the other situations after that the schedule is calculated.
        Parameters:
        event - event that need a feasible path.
        privateMeans - allowed private travel means according to event preferences.
        publicMeans - allowed public travel means according to event preferences.
        Returns:
        the requested path if available, null otherwise.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • getPreviousTravels

        private java.util.List<Travel> getPreviousTravels(Event event,
                                                  java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                                  java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans)
                                           throws GMapsGeneralException
        Defines the departure location for an event and calculates all possible paths according to the schedule.
        Parameters:
        event - the event of which previous travels are calculated.
        privateMeans - list of allowed private means.
        publicMeans - list of allowed public means.
        Returns:
        all possible previous paths according to the schedule.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • getFollowingTravels

        private java.util.List<Travel> getFollowingTravels(Event event,
                                                   java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                                   java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans)
                                            throws GMapsGeneralException
        Checks if an event is the last of the schedule and calculates all possible paths according to the schedule.
        Parameters:
        event - the event of which following travels are calculated.
        privateMeans - list of allowed private means.
        publicMeans - list of allowed public means.
        Returns:
        all possible following paths according to the schedule, null if it oesn't exist any following event.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • possiblePathsAdder

        private java.util.List<Travel> possiblePathsAdder(java.lang.String baseCall,
                                                  java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                                  java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans,
                                                  Event eventA,
                                                  Event eventB,
                                                  boolean sameLoc,
                                                  boolean prevDateAllowed)
                                           throws GMapsGeneralException
        Calculates private and eventually public travels according to specified means, events, times and locations.
        Parameters:
        baseCall - url to use containing info on locations and time of the path.
        privateMeans - list of allowed private means.
        publicMeans - list of allowed public means.
        eventA - event before the path.
        eventB - event after the path.
        sameLoc - boolean that indicates if the path starts and ends in the same location.
        prevDateAllowed - boolean that indicates if the date related to previous event is not in the past, in this case it can be used to calculate the path.
        Returns:
        all the possible paths for a given travel, according to the user's schedule.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • privatePathsHandler

        private void privatePathsHandler(java.util.List<Travel> possiblePaths,
                                 java.lang.String baseCall,
                                 Event eventA,
                                 Event eventB,
                                 java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                 boolean sameLoc,
                                 boolean prevDateAllowed)
                          throws GMapsUnavailableException,
                                 BadRequestException,
                                 LocationNotFoundException
        Calculates possible paths whose travel means can be: car, bike or walking.
        Parameters:
        possiblePaths - list of possible paths where the result found in the function must be added.
        baseCall - base url containing info on locations and time that must be enriched before perform the call.
        eventA - event before the path.
        eventB - event after the path.
        privateMeans - list of private means used in the calculated paths.
        sameLoc - boolean that indicates if the path starts and ends in the same location.
        prevDateAllowed - boolean that indicates if the date related to previous event is not in the past, in this case it can be used to calculate the path.
        Throws:
        GMapsUnavailableException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.
        BadRequestException - if the path computation fails cause a wrong request.
        LocationNotFoundException - if the path computation fails cause the location specified is not found.

      • publicPathsHandler

        private void publicPathsHandler(java.util.List<Travel> possiblePaths,
                                java.lang.String baseCall,
                                Event eventA,
                                Event eventB,
                                java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans,
                                boolean sameLoc)
                         throws GMapsGeneralException
        Calculates possible paths whose travel means can be: tram, train, bus or subway.
        Parameters:
        possiblePaths - list of possible paths where the result found in the function must be added.
        baseCall - base url containing info on locations and time that must be enriched before perform the call.
        eventA - event before the path.
        eventB - event after the path.
        publicMeans - list of public means used in the calculated paths.
        sameLoc - boolean that indicates if the path starts and ends in the same location.
        Throws:
        GMapsUnavailableException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.
        BadRequestException - if the path computation fails cause a wrong request.
        LocationNotFoundException - if the path computation fails cause the location specified is not found.
        GMapsGeneralException

      • previousDateAllowed

        private boolean previousDateAllowed(Event eventA)
        States if the ending time of the event passed can be used as reference time to calculate paths.
        Parameters:
        eventA - event before the path.
        Returns:
        true if the ending time of the event is not in the past, false otherwise.

      • travelFeasibleInTimeslot

        private boolean travelFeasibleInTimeslot(Event eventA,
                                         Event eventB,
                                         Travel travel)
        States if travels are feasible in the time between two events.
        Parameters:
        eventA - the event before the travel.
        eventB - the event after the travel.
        travel - the travel to control.
        Returns:
        true if the travel can be done without overlapping in the schedule.

      • isBetweenSameLocations

        private boolean isBetweenSameLocations(Event event)
        States if a path must be calculated between the same locations
        Parameters:
        event - the event involved into the calculation of path.
        Returns:
        true if departure locaction and event location are almost the same, false otherwise.

      • swapEvents

        public java.util.List<GenericEvent> swapEvents(Event forcedEvent,
                                               java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                               java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> publicMeans)
                                        throws GMapsGeneralException
        Forces an overlapping event into the schedule and handles the swap out operations of any scheduled event or break that is in conflict with the forced one.
        Parameters:
        forcedEvent - event that must be inserted into the schedule.
        privateMeans - list of allowed private means for the forcedEvent.
        publicMeans - list of allowed public means for the forcedEvent.
        Returns:
        a list of modified events or a new ArrayList if the swap operation is not feasible.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • conclusionForSwap

        private java.util.List<GenericEvent> conclusionForSwap(PathCombination best,
                                                       Event forcedEvent,
                                                       java.util.List<GenericEvent> swapOut)
        Performs saving operations for the events modified after the swap operations.
        Parameters:
        best - path combination calculated for the event swapped into the schedule.
        forcedEvent - overlapping event forced into the schedule
        swapOut - events that must be swapped out due to the swapped in event.
        Returns:
        a list of modified events that can be used by the client application.

      • breakToRemove

        private BreakEvent breakToRemove(Event forcedEvent)
        Determines which break event must be swapped out, from the less overlapping one.
        Parameters:
        forcedEvent - event to swap into the schedule
        Returns:
        break event to remove in order to ensure the swap in of an event, null if there is no break event scheduled.

      • firstSwapPhase

        private void firstSwapPhase(Event forcedEvent,
                            java.util.List<GenericEvent> swapOutEvents)
        Removes from the schedule all the scheduled events that overlap with the forced event, without considering related-paths.
        Parameters:
        forcedEvent - event to swap in.
        swapOutEvents - a list where all swap out-events must be added.

      • privateMeansSameLoc

        private java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeansSameLoc(java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans)
        Controls the path calculation when starting and ending locations are the same: remove car if it is in the list and add by_foot if it is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        privateMeans - list of allowed private travel means.
        Returns:
        the list with by_foot and without car.

      • getBestPathInfo

        public Travel getBestPathInfo(long pathId)
                       throws EntityNotFoundException,
                              NotScheduledException
        Retrives information about the specified path.
        Parameters:
        pathId - the identifier of the event associated to the requested path.
        Returns:
        the travel requested
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the entity is not found
        NotScheduledException - if the related-event is not scheduled

        public void setCurrentUser(User currentUser)
        Method called to initialize this bean with an authenticated user.
        Overrides:
        setCurrentUser in class UserManager
        Parameters:
        currentUser - authenticated user class instance.

      • swapGenericEvent

        public java.util.List<GenericEvent> swapGenericEvent(long eventId)
                                              throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                                     AlreadyScheduledException,
                                                     GMapsGeneralException
        Force a genericEvent into the schedule, removing all the events that overlaps with it
        Parameters:
        eventId - identifier of the event to be forced into the schedule
        Returns:
        a list of generic events, modified during the swap
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the event to be swapped does not exist
        AlreadyScheduledException - if the event is already in the schedule, and so it can't be forced into it
        GMapsGeneralException - if Google Maps services are unavailable

      • swapEvent

        public java.util.List<GenericEvent> swapEvent(Event forcedEvent)
                                       throws GMapsGeneralException
        Force a event into the schedule, removing all the events that overlaps with it
        Parameters:
        forcedEvent - event to be forced into the schedule
        Returns:
        a list of modified ( due to the swap ) events
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if Google Maps services are unavailable

      • swapBreakEvent

        public java.util.List<GenericEvent> swapBreakEvent(BreakEvent forcedBreak)
                                            throws GMapsGeneralException
        Forces an overlapping break event into the schedule and handles the swap out operations of any scheduled event or break that is in conflict with the forced one.
        Parameters:
        forcedBreak - break that must be inserted into the schedule.
        Returns:
        a list of modified events.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

      • swapOutOverlappingBreaks

        private void swapOutOverlappingBreaks(java.util.List<GenericEvent> response,
                                      BreakEvent forcedBreak)
        Removes from schedule all the overlapping breaks.
        Parameters:
        response - list where any modified event must be added.
        forcedBreak - break event to add.

      • eventToRemove

        private Event eventToRemove(java.util.List<Event> involved,
                            BreakEvent forcedBreak)
        Determines which event to remove, first the most overlapping with the break to swap in.
        Parameters:
        involved - list of events overlapping with break event.
        forcedBreak - break event to swap in.
        Returns:
        the event that overlap at most with the break event, among the events passed.

      • adjustFollowing

        private void adjustFollowing(java.util.List<GenericEvent> response,
                             Event following)
                      throws GMapsGeneralException
        Adjusts the path of the event that follows a deleted event.
        Parameters:
        response - list where any modified event must be added.
        following - the event whose related-path must be recalculated.
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable.

        Adds to the ArrayList of response an event that must be removed from the schedule.
        Parameters:

        event - event to remove.

                                           Event event,
                                           Travel path)
        Adds to the ArrayList of response an event whose path must be recalculated.
        Parameters:
        response - list where any modified event must be added.
        event - event to update.
        path - path that must be added to event.

      • avoidLongWalkingCalculation

        private void avoidLongWalkingCalculation(java.util.List<TravelMeanEnum> privateMeans,
                                         Event event)
        Avoids the calculation of path for very very long distances....
        Parameters:
        privateMeans - list of private means, used to remove walking in case of long distance.
        event - event whose path must be calculated.
